main event: An observer reported seeing pulsating light sources in the sky, which alternated between disappearance and reappearance over a period of 17 minutes.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 17 minutes., One light source was first spotted and lasted for about 3 minutes., A second light appeared 15 minutes later moving in a northerly direction., Both lights moved in parallel for about 2 minutes before the original light faded., The sequence seemed to involve alternating appearances and disappearances of the lights.
sighted object: one/two light sources in the sky
witness description: Civil engineer with GIMRADA, Fort Belvoir, VA.
